about_the_game:
Welcome to the exhilarating world of Paper Planes, Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey where strategy, skill, and precision are the keys to victory. In this fast-paced game, you'll engage in epic dogfights, outmaneuver rivals, and strategically dismantle their bases to claim dominance in the skies.

Gameplay Overview:

Play solo or with friends. Whether you're taking down an onslaught of unique objectives by yourself, facing intimidating bosses, or battle against your friends, there's something for everyone of all ages to enjoy. Paper Planes pits players against each other in intense aerial combat, where the primary objective is to eliminate opposing players' bases while defending your own. You'll navigate through diverse landscapes, ranging from lush forests to treacherous canyons, each offering unique challenges and tactical opportunities.

Key Features:

Customizable nostalgic toy planes:

Choose from an array of meticulously designed paper, foam, and toy planes, each with its own customizable features.

Dynamic Combat Mechanics:

Experience dynamic aerial combat with responsive controls and physics-based gameplay. Master the art of aerial maneuvers, including barrel rolls, loop-the-loops, and evasive maneuvers, to outmaneuver opponents and evade incoming fire.

Team-based Strategy:

Form alliances and coordinate with teammates to launch coordinated assaults on enemy bases or defend against incoming threats. Communication and teamwork are crucial for achieving victory in intense PVP, team, and free-for-all battles.

Progression and Rewards:

Earn experience points and unlock new planes, weapons, and upgrades as you progress through the ranks. Compete in ranked matches to climb the leaderboard and earn exclusive rewards, including rare customization options and in-game currency.

Immersive Environments:

Immerse yourself in stunning, handcrafted environments. From bustling metropolises to city parks to psychadelic mushroom worlds, every location is brimming with detail and personality.

Social Integration:

Connect with friends, join guilds, and participate in events to enhance your gaming experience. Share replays of your most epic battles, strategize with teammates, and compete in tournaments to prove your skills as the ultimate ace pilot.

Conclusion:

Prepare to take flight in the ultimate test of skill, strategy, and aerial supremacy. Whether you're soaring through the clouds or engaging in intense dogfights, Paper Planes offers an unmatched adrenaline rush and endless hours of thrilling action. So, assemble your squadron, customize your plane, and dominate the skies in this high-flying adventure!

name: Paper Planes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 or AMD FX-6350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 7700k or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

short_description: Take your role as protector and defend your assets from enemy squadrons or engage in devastation as the attacker. Fly with the best Paper Plane pilots in the world in hand crafted parks with an abundance of enemies to destroy. Paper Planes is an Arcade team-flightsim, base defender and battleroyale.
